AtomNode.trailing: -- Enforce naming conventions for index variables.

CommandDoccommentNode.comment:
`Perm as bs` asserts that `as` and `bs` are permutations of each other.
This is a wrapper around `List.Perm`, and for now has much less API. For more complicated verification, use `perm_iff_toList_perm` and the `List` API. -/

AtomNode.val:
`Perm as bs` asserts that `as` and `bs` are permutations of each other.
This is a wrapper around `List.Perm`, and for now has much less API. For more complicated verification, use `perm_iff_toList_perm` and the `List` API. -/

OtherNode.state_before: case mk.mk α : Type u_1 lo hi : Nat xs ys : List α h : xs ~ ys wlo : ∀ (i : Nat), i < lo → xs[i]? = ys[i]? whi : ∀ (i : Nat), hi ≤ i → xs[i]? = ys[i]? ⊢ List.take (hi - lo) (List.drop lo xs) ~ List.take (hi - lo) (List.drop lo ys)

OtherNode.tactic: apply List.Perm.take_of_getElem? (w := fun i h => by simpa using whi (lo + i) (by omega))

OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_before: α : Type u_1 lo hi : Nat xs ys : List α h✝¹ : xs ~ ys wlo : ∀ (i : Nat), i < lo → xs[i]? = ys[i]? whi : ∀ (i : Nat), hi ≤ i → xs[i]? = ys[i]? h✝ : List.drop lo xs ~ List.drop lo ys i : Nat h : hi - lo ≤ i ⊢ hi ≤ lo + i
OtherNode.state_after: no goals

OtherNode.state_before: case mk.mk α : Type u_1 lo hi : Nat xs ys : List α h : xs ~ ys wlo : ∀ (i : Nat), i < lo → xs[i]? = ys[i]? whi : ∀ (i : Nat), hi ≤ i → xs[i]? = ys[i]? ⊢ List.drop lo xs ~ List.drop lo ys
OtherNode.state_after: case mk.mk α : Type u_1 lo hi : Nat xs ys : List α h : xs ~ ys wlo : ∀ (i : Nat), i < lo → xs[i]? = ys[i]? whi : ∀ (i : Nat), hi ≤ i → xs[i]? = ys[i]? ⊢ xs ~ ys

OtherNode.state_before: case mk.mk α : Type u_1 lo hi : Nat xs ys : List α h : xs ~ ys wlo : ∀ (i : Nat), i < lo → xs[i]? = ys[i]? whi : ∀ (i : Nat), hi ≤ i → xs[i]? = ys[i]? ⊢ xs ~ ys

Comment.text: -- Enforce naming conventions for index variables.

`Perm as bs` asserts that `as` and `bs` are permutations of each other.
This is a wrapper around `List.Perm`, and for now has much less API. For more complicated verification, use `perm_iff_toList_perm` and the `List` API. -/
